name: Stuck In The Past (Semi-beta 8/14)
description:
When Reid is banished to a foreign world he can't fight his way out of, he confides his remaining knowledge an in unlikely hero to retrieve an artifact and take him home.

While most of the music in the later half and some bells and whistles are missing, the game is fundamentally done and can be beaten. While I appreciate any feedback, I'm specifically looking for any thoughts on...

  • Game balancing
    • Are the enemies too easy or hard?
    • Are items hard to find or purchase?
    • Does the game have a good pace without feeling grindy?
  • Length
    • How long does it take you to complete the game?
    • Can it be completed under 45 (preferably 30-35) minutes? There may or may not be a postgame afterwards, and I want to ensure we have room for that just in case.
  • Bugs
    • If it looks like a bug, tell me about it

Refrain from investigating the game files if you want to avoid spoilers!

Created for the Enter The Haroldverse jam by callmeDJ and Violet Spinel.
